title: My Christmas cake
ingredients: ['450g mixed dried fruit', '350ml alcohol of choice (whisky, rum, stout, etc.)', '100g butter', '100g dark brown soft sugar', '3 medium eggs, beaten', '1 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon mixed spice', '100g self-raising flour', '50g ground almonds', '50g chopped almonds (optional)']
